Author: carlfk
Content: Somewhere @Tim 'mithro' Ansell said something like "same number of reticle shots, but the reticle is smaller"

Author: mithro_
Content: reticle is the same size, we just can't use as much of it.

Author: carlfk
Content: ok - does that might mean there is dead areas between the shots?

Author: mithro_
Content: There are just some larger cut lines

Author: carlfk
Content: if all of the reticle was used, would there be overlap across shots?

Author: carlfk
Content: is the size of the shot on the wafer constant?

Author: mole99
Content:
The size of the reticle is 32000x26000, the size of the usable area is 30000x24000.
I think Andrew is aware that he isn't done yet, as he mentioned above:

> I also know there is a dead area near the edges I need to account for
